alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Chickasaw and central Monroe Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prairie, or 8 miles west of Aberdeen, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Prairie, Hatley, Gattman, Binford, Sipsey Fork, New Hamilton, Becker, Quincy, Egypt, Splunge, Wise Gap, Athens, East Aberdeen and Greenwood Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
